english_example_sentence: If I were tired, I would immediately sit on this soft armchair in the house.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я устал, я бы сразу сел на это мягкое кресло в доме.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer yorgun olsam, bu evdeki yumuşak koltuğa hemen otursam.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Eğer yorgun olsam, bu evdeki yumuşak koltuğa hemen ______.
